channel.description: I'm a Web Developer working at Nifty Digits in Cardiff, UK. Here, I enjoy talking code - mostly javascript. I'm @iwootten on twitter.

item.title: Where does Steam store Indie Game The Movie?
item.author: I.M.Wootten<
item.description:
A quickie – but for all those that have downloaded “Indie Game the Movie” today from steam and are wondering where the video files are stored, you can find them here:

Steam/SteamApps/common/Indie Game The Movie/data/movies
